Henry Bergman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Bergman 0 Henry Bergman (February 23, 1868 – October 22, 1946) was an American actor of stage and film, known for his long association with Charlie Chaplin. Henry_Bergman ( February_23_,_1868 – October_22_,_1946 ) was an_American_actor of stage_and_film , known for his_long_association with Charlie_Chaplin .
